Description:
This role would suit some-one who enjoys helping others get things done swiftly and effectively and who will gladly take the initiative to carry out anything and everything from the smallest day-to-day tasks to the more complex tasks. You work in a detailed, timely and professional way. You are experienced in presenting research in a visually clear and informative manner. You pride yourself in negotiating the best value and proactively suggest ways to earn and redeem loyalty benefits. You are positive, punctual, and self-motivated. Reporting to a senior PA on the team, this role will involve a mixture of working from your home as well as being out-and-about running errands or helping out at a property.
